name: Image Optimizer
description:
Image Optimizer is a compression tool that lets designers compress the images within Adobe XD. 

Simply select the image/s that you want to compress and then click the plugin button. Shortcut = Mac:'Cmd+Alt+O' / Windows:'Ctrl+Alt+O'.

Note: Due to API's current limitation, you will not be able to compress images from multiple artboards or from different parent containers.

Contact support with questions: irajashekarb@gmail.com
author: Raja Shekar
